game.name: RuneScape ®
game.genres: Massively Multiplayer, RPG, Free To Play
game.categories: Multi-player, MMO, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Steam Achievements, In-App Purchases, Adjustable Text Size, Camera Comfort, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Save Anytime, Subtitle Options, Touch Only Option
game.shortDescription: RuneScape is a high fantasy open world MMORPG. Explore an ever changing and evolving living world where new challenges, skills, and quests await. Featuring unprecedented player freedom, you choose how to play, adventure, and grow.
game.shortDescriptionEn: RuneScape is a high fantasy open world MMORPG. Explore an ever changing and evolving living world where new challenges, skills, and quests await. Featuring unprecedented player freedom, you choose how to play, adventure, and grow.

reviewHighlights.text: I have been playing for around 18 years now. Don’t let my hours fool you—I recently switched to Linux (Bazzite), and this was the easiest way to play....
2002: Randomly stumbled upon Runescape on my browser while using 56k dial up, pay per minute. Wandered around for an hour, tried to doing things. Conf...
